QuestData.Title: Eyes of Desire
QuestData.Description: I have a buyer who is interested in the eyes of the Cobalt Serpents that have taken up residence here.$B$BIf you were to bring me some of these rare gems, I would cut you a portion of the profits.$B$BDo we have a deal?
QuestData.LogDescription: Dealer Vijad inside the Sethekk Halls wants you to bring him 3 Cobalt Eyes.
QuestData.RewardText: These are marvelous. Well done!$B$BHere's your cut, as promised.
